sent.orig: I must seize the day, seize the hour.
Seize the minute, seize the hour!
Ten thousand years is too long,seize the day,seize the hour!
Seize this moment to create the future. Seize present causes and conditions to improve the future.
sent.trans: 把握当下，才能创造继起的生命；展望未来，应该把握当下的机缘。

sent.orig: The corporate landscape is being rearranged, while the well-managed and liquid players seize advantage.
sent.trans: 企业界的格局正在重新调整，管理良好且流动性强的企业正占据优势。
